20 constexpr std::string CONFIG_FOLDER("/config"); //< Configuration subfolder
21 constexpr std::string DESCRIPTION_FOLDER("_description/robots"); //< URDF Robot Description subfolder

33 void get_files_recursively(const bfs::path &dir, const std::string &ext, std::vector<FileList> &found) {
34  FileList files;
35  std::vector<FileList> children;
36  if (!bfs::exists(dir))
37  return;
38  if (!bfs::is_directory(dir))
39  return;
40  bfs::directory_iterator end_it;
41  for (bfs::directory_iterator it(dir); it != end_it; ++it) {
42  if (bfs::is_directory(it->path())) {
43  get_files_recursively(it->path(), ext, children);
44  } else {
45  const std::string filename = it->path().leaf().string();
46  //ROS_INFO("Filename: %s", filename.c_str());
47  if (filename.size() > ext.size())
48  if (filename.compare(filename.size() - ext.size(), ext.size(), ext) == 0) {
49  files.filenames.push_back(filename);
50  }
51  }
52  }
53  files.folder = dir.leaf().string();
54  files.parent_folder = 0;
55  //ROS_INFO("I'm %s", files.folder.c_str());
56  found.emplace_back(std::move(files));
57  if (children.size()) {
58  //ROS_INFO("I have %d children.", (int)children.size());
59  int pos = found.size();
60  std::for_each(children.begin(), children.end(), [&pos](FileList &x) {
61  x.parent_folder += pos;
62  });
63  found.insert(found.end(), children.begin(), children.end());
64  }
65 }
66 
78 bool HandleFiles(FilesHandler::Request &req, FilesHandler::Response &res) {
79  bfs::path path(req.folder);
80  if (!bfs::is_directory(path))
81  return false;
82  switch (static_cast<FHST>(req.service))
83  {
84  case FHST::CreateFile:
85  ROS_FATAL("Create files is not yet implemented.");
86  return false;
87  case FHST::CreateFolder:
88  path /= req.filename;
89  if (bfs::exists(path)) {
90  ROS_WARN("Folder already exists");
91  res.result = static_cast<uint8_t>(IOState::FileAlreadyExists);
92  } else {
93  if (bfs::create_directory(path))
94  res.result = static_cast<uint8_t>(IOState::OK);
95  else
96  res.result = static_cast<uint8_t>(IOState::ErrorCreating);
97  }
98  break;
99  case FHST::DeleteFile:
100  path /= req.filename;
101  if (!bfs::exists(path)) {
102  ROS_WARN("File not exists");
103  res.result = static_cast<uint8_t>(IOState::FileNotExists);
104  } else if (bfs::is_directory(path)) {
105  ROS_WARN("Do not pretend to remove a file, but pass me a folder.");
106  res.result = static_cast<uint8_t>(IOState::BadFile);
107  } else {
108  if (bfs::remove(path))
109  res.result = static_cast<uint8_t>(IOState::OK);
110  else
111  res.result = static_cast<uint8_t>(IOState::ErrorDeleting);
112  }
113  break;
114  case FHST::DeleteFolder:
115  if (!bfs::exists(path)) {
116  ROS_WARN("Folder not exists");
117  res.result = static_cast<uint8_t>(IOState::FileNotExists);
118  } else if (!bfs::is_directory(path)) {
119  ROS_WARN("Do not pretend to remove a direcory, but pass me a file.");
120  res.result = static_cast<uint8_t>(IOState::BadFile);
121  } else {
122  if (bfs::remove(path))
123  res.result = static_cast<uint8_t>(IOState::OK);
124  else
125  res.result = static_cast<uint8_t>(IOState::ErrorDeleting);
126  }
127  break;
128  default:
129  ROS_FATAL("Instruction not identified");
130  return false;
131  }
132  return true;
133 }
134 
151 bool ListFiles (Files::Request &req, Files::Response &res)
152 {
153  std::string folder = pumpkin_path;
154  std::string extension;
155 
156 
157  switch(static_cast<FileType>(req.type)) {
158  case FileType::ConfigFile:
159  folder += CONFIG_FOLDER;
160  extension = ".yaml";
161  break;
162  case FileType::RobotDescription:
163  folder += DESCRIPTION_FOLDER;
164  extension = ".URDF";
165  break;
166  case FileType::PlaybackFile:
167  folder += PLAYBACK_FOLDER;
168  extension = ".yaml";
169  break;
170  case FileType::Error:
171  default:
172  ROS_ERROR("ERROR! Type code not identified!");
173  return false;
174  }
175 
176  ROS_INFO("Folder: %s", folder.c_str());
177  res.base_path = folder.substr(0, folder.rfind('/'));
178  get_files_recursively(bfs::path(folder), extension, res.files);
179 
180  return res.files.size() > 0;
181 }
182 
195 int main (int argc, char** argv)
196 {
197 
198  ros::init(argc, argv, "file_server");
199  ros::NodeHandle n;
200 
201  char * env = getenv("PUMPKIN_PATH");
202 
203  if (env != nullptr) {
204  pumpkin_path = env;
205  } else if (!ros::param::get("~pumpkin_path", pumpkin_path)) {
206  ROS_FATAL("Could not get PUMPKIN_PATH.");
207  return -1;
208  }
209 
210  ros::ServiceServer files = n.advertiseService("file_lister", ListFiles);
211  ros::ServiceServer handler = n.advertiseService("file_handler", HandleFiles);
212  ROS_INFO("Ready.");
213  ros::spin();
214 
215  files.shutdown();
216  handler.shutdown();
217 
218  return 0;
219 }
